Apply now for an opportunity to work with Cadreon -- the best Ad Tech company out there! https://lnkd.in/e4CHmke

Are you a programmatic-trading expert with a passion for AdTech? Cadreon is the place for you! Our NYC office is looking for a Programmatic Campaign Manager to work with an award-wining team and create campaigns for awesome clients! Apply today and ‘like’ this if you know someone in your network who might be interested! #Cadreon #NYC #Programmatic #AdTech #Jobs

- Source, recruit, interview and match talented digital, web and interactive professionals toclients’ creative needs using our internal database, job boards, social networking andportfolio sites- Coordinate and prepare candidates for external interviews- Complete I-9 forms, verify I-9 documentation and assist with employee backgroundchecks- Provide candidates with guidance through resume edits, portfolio tailoring, interview bestpractices, and sharing industry knowledge- Manage on-boarding and training of new employees

- Developed a personal client base through innovative marketing tactics to promote ourstaffing services for full-time creative/marketing staffing solutions- Managed full life-cycle recruitment process- Marketed our services through professional communication over the phone and in-personmeetings with various clients to establish new relationships as well as maintain currentrelationships- Recruited, interviewed and placed creative professionals

- Built and grew a candidate talent base through strategic networking for creative andmarketing projects and interim staffing solutions- Explored and utilized innovative methods of sourcing candidates through use of ourinternal database, diverse job boards, social networking sites, and personal websites- Cultivated strong business relationships through professional communications andparticipation in local organizations and events as a company representative- Successfully placed two candidates within 30 days of start date in full time positions- Met weekly interview goal of 10 interviews

- Drove the full sales cycle from managing my own leads to successfully closing countlessdeals- Made introductory calls and assessed business goals through qualifying leads- Assisted business owners in Yelp’s platform and advertising packages- Assisted in the launch of Yelp’s new Pay Per Click program
